mean_cn: n.实习医师；被拘留者；  v.作实习医师
mean_en: to put somebody in prison during a war or for political reasons, although they have not been charged with a crime
sentence: Our hospital's interns hope to learn as much as they can from our doctors.
sentence_trans: 我们医院的实习医师希望能尽可能地向他们的医生学习。
word_etyma: in使…，作… + tern三个一组 → intern实习医师
